text: David Alan Brat (born July 27, 1964) is an American politician and businessman. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the U.S. Representative for Virginia's 7th congressional district from 2014 to 2019. Brat became known when he beat House Majority Leader Eric Cantor in the district's 2014 Republican primary. Brat's primary victory over Cantor made him the first primary challenger to beat a sitting House Majority Leader. Brat lost his reelection bid in 2018 to Democrat Abigail Spanberger. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dave Brat
